lines.content: * Represents a deadline task with a name and a due date.
* The due date is supplied as a string in ISO-8601 format
* and stored internally as a LocalDate.
* Constructs a Deadline with the given task name and due date.
* @param dueDate the due date string in ISO-8601 format.
* @throws DateTimeException if the date string is not in format,
*                           or if the year/month/day values are invalid.
public Deadline(String name, String dueDate) throws DateTimeException {

* @return the string representation of this deadline.
* Represents a event task with a start and end date.
* Dates are provided as ISO-8601 strings and stored as a LocalDate.

* @param startDate the start date string in yyyy-MM-dd format.
* @param endDate the end date string in yyyy-MM-dd format.

* Represents a mutable list of Task objects and provides convenience operations
* to add/remove tasks, mark them done/undone, and render user-facing messages.
/** Backing store of tasks in insertion order. */

* Marks the task at the specified index as not done and returns a user-facing message.

* @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range.
